alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Gulf, southwestern Liberty and northwestern Franklin Counties through 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/... At 448 PM EDT/348 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northeast of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Minor Flooding due to heavy rain and Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flood impacts including roadway ponding are expected. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Buck Siding, Beverly, Hays Place and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
